s.text: At least, this is what I tell Italian-Americans who write me incredibly nasty letters when my mob stories appear.
Wait a frigging second--could you please explain to me the phallic symbolism of herring?
Oh, I know where--by telling you I finally get your Judith "De Man" Shulevitz joke.
By annoying, I am referring to Tony's sister, who is with us for the entire season, apparently.
Man, they should have killed off Livia when they had the chance, and that way they wouldn't have to saddle us with her dreary daughter.
